entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:59 a.m. ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.3Â°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
